summary: Adds the mask worn by Tobi vs Minato.
descriptionHtml:
Tobi Original Mask
==================================================================
Author: esuriddick
Permissions: as long as you grant credit to where you picked up the files, you can do whatever you want with the files. Thanks!
Remark: the thing used to grab the mask to the head doesn't belong to me and, therefore, the use of it should be asked to their respective creators: 1a1a or robert101410.

==============================
Description
==============================
Adds Tobi's original mask (the one used against Minato). There are two ways to obtain the mask:
1 - Craft it (it will be under the leather branch).
2 - Write in console "player.additem 38000d63 1", without the ".

As a final remark, this mask is also possible to temper with.

This was my first time creating a clothing item, and mostly a test to see if I knew how to do it. My main goal is to make the last mask of Tobi. Therefore, I ask the users to give any tip/advice you can remember to help me with that mask.

==============================
Installation
==============================
Just extract the folders and .esp to Skyrim's Data folder.

==============================
Optional files currently available
==============================
- Made the mask compatible with the akatsuki robe.

==============================
Current bugs
==============================
- For some reason, it seems that loading a game on which you have the mask will make it disappear. I'm trying to fix the problem right away, since I play with the mask and it is quite annoying that. ([b]FIXED[/b] in version 1.1)

Steam Workshop (v1.1): http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=106344152

Enjoy.
author: esuriddick

files.name: Tobi Original Mask v1 1 - smaller for compatibility with hoods
